title: Focus on India
brief_description: An outline of some of the difficulties facing India’s new rulers and the progress being made in many branches of her economy. Among the topics discussed and illustrated are the plans whereby India is attempting to stamp out illiteracy; the attempts being made to weld the many different sects and castes into a single nation; the development of new agricultural and industrial projects.
